name: Paris, France
description: The city of lights and love, famous for its art, fashion, and landmarks.

details.long_description: Paris, the capital of France, is known for its iconic Eiffel Tower, world-class museums like the Louvre, and charming cafés.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrive in Paris, visit the Eiffel Tower, and explore the Seine River.
Day 2: Discover the Louvre Museum and stroll through the Champs-Élysées.
Day 3: Visit Montmartre, Sacré-Cœur Basilica, and enjoy a Seine river cruise.

name: Kyoto, Japan
description: A city of temples and tradition, where the past meets the present.

details.long_description: Kyoto, Japan's cultural heart, is home to ancient temples, stunning gardens, and traditional tea houses.
itinerary: Day 1: Visit Fushimi Inari Shrine and explore Gion district.
Day 2: Tour Kinkaku-ji (Golden Pavilion) and Arashiyama Bamboo Forest.
Day 3: Experience a traditional tea ceremony and visit Nijo Castle.

name: New York City, USA
description: The city that never sleeps, full of skyscrapers, Broadway, and Central Park.

details.long_description: New York City is a melting pot of cultures and entertainment, featuring Times Square, the Statue of Liberty, and world-class museums.
itinerary: Day 1: Visit Times Square, Broadway, and the Empire State Building.
Day 2: Explore Central Park, the Metropolitan Museum of Art, and 5th Avenue shopping.
Day 3: Take a ferry to the Statue of Liberty and enjoy a skyline view from Brooklyn Bridge.

name: Santorini, Greece
description: Famous for its white-washed buildings, blue domes, and stunning sunsets.

details.long_description: Santorini is a Greek island known for its picturesque villages, volcanic beaches, and breathtaking caldera views.
itinerary: Day 1: Explore Fira and Oia, watch the sunset at Oia Castle.
Day 2: Visit the ancient ruins of Akrotiri and relax on the Red Beach.
Day 3: Enjoy a sailing tour of the volcanic islands and hot springs.
